summary: Shield gauntlets for your rouge build.
descriptionHtml:
Please keep in mind this is my first attempt at making something craftable.

I felt that a shield looked ridiculous on my assassin, so I created a few sets of gauntlets that also take up the shield slot. They have stats a little less than the shield of their sets (I might release my OP speed run version in the future)

Shield-gauntlets are craftable at the Skyforge with a set of gauntlets and a shield from the set (meaning dragonplate shield-gauntlets need dragonplate gauntlets and a dragonplate shield etc.) and require their respective perks. A few sets didn't have a shield, so I tried to pair it with something semi-lore friendly.

I've also added them to the test cell, and a few sets can be found in the hold capitals (for lazy people who don't feel like making them).

All items are temperable and enchantable.

I'll try to release an update to include stalhrim, but right now CC is being an a$$ and not letting me open Dragonborn. Let me know if you think I should add anything to it.
author: SpiralFafnir
